Job Description: The Role:             Senior Software Developer will be a valuable member of our Global Navibilling team of Hansen Technology. You will be role model for the HANSENCX values and strategy who has deep understanding about Telecom industry. The organization works agile and we have an open atmosphere and culture where communication and knowledge sharing is the key for common success               How will you contribute              You will develop systems hands on, taking on the most technically complex and difficult development activities.         On any given day you will be expected to undertake responsibilities including:            Mentoring of new software developers as and when needed         Solution analysis and design         Estimation         Development and programming in Microsoft Dynamics in C/AL and AL         Quality assurance and testing         Documentation                Our Ideal Person:             We are looking for a real super star, who has strong background of MS Dynamics and who is willing to take up         initiatives in making significant contribution to the technical design and implementation             4 - 6 years of relevant work experience         Understanding Microsoft Dynamics NAV/Dynamics 365 Business Central          Microsoft Office and integration to NAV/Business Central         Experience with C/AL and AL programming         Preferable Telecom Industry knowledge         Scrum and agile development methodologies knowledge will be preferred.         SQL and SQL Server Reporting Services, HTML/Markup, C#          Experience in MS.Net Framework will be preferred.         Broad knowledge and understanding of software development principles         Has proven extensive knowledge of tools and methods and the ability to apply these efficiently
